name: Matt Hazard: Blood Bath and Beyond
name_original: Matt Hazard: Blood Bath and Beyond
description:
The ultimate arcade action experience for hardcore video game fans! Matt Hazard: Blood Bath and Beyond is an homage to the greatest side scrolling action games of all time. Enjoy nonstop run and gun survival at its finest in an over the top tribute to timeless video game themes.

Features:
THE MOST AWESOME ARCADE ACTION EXPERIENCE EVER! Classic side scrolling action meets over-the-top combat. A dynamic tribute to the greatest action arcade games of all time.
BECOME VIDEO GAME HERO MATT HAZARD! Survive the ultimate showdown with his greatest enemies and the diabolical General Neutronov.
TONS OF WEAPONS. TONS OF ENEMIES! Timeless tools like flame throwers and rocket launchers rip apart everything from mutant penguins, to evil ninjas, to naughty cowboys, to giant Bosses like the 200-foot-tall mechanical Rhino-zilla.
EVIL ENVIRONMENTS COME TO LIFE! Pirate hideouts, Siberian ice mines and more. Beautifully rendered with tons to destroy!
2 PLAYER CO-OP GAMEPLAY AND ONLINE LEADERBOARDS! Play side-by-side with friends and track high scores online.
